title: Design for Embroidered (Lace?) Tablecloth with Stylized Tulip (?) Motif
medium: Pen and black ink on glassine
description: Design for approximately one-quarter of cloth.  Starting from the center: a four-pointed star alternating with an abstract tulip motif; surrounded by a folded ribbon (like shirt collar) motif alternating with stylized tulip motif; larger border near outer edge with abstract bolded ribbon border alternating with tulip motif; outermost border, a double ruled line with single triangles alternating with overlapping triple triangles with clustered triangles in four corners.
name: Drawing
